mapper.select: SELECT content, answer.id as 'id',answer.creat_time as 'creat_time',user_id,username,likes FROM answer,user where answer.question_id=#{questionId} and answer.user_id = user.id ORDER BY likes desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET likes = likes+1 WHERE id= #{id};
UPDATE answer SET likes = likes-1 WHERE id= #{id};
